text: Dick Delicious and the Tasty Testicles are an American comedy and heavy metal band from Atlanta, Georgia. The band formed in 1992. They released 3 albums from 1995 to 2003. In 2003, they were given the "Howard Stern Award for Musical Excellence". The band ended later in 2003. The band reformed in 2011. The guitar player Ruyter Suys joined their band as well. Suys was from the southern rock band Nashville Pussy. Nashville Pussy, Mastodon, and Brutal Truth combined to record a new album. The band's 4th album, A Vulgar Display of Obscurity, was released in 2011. == References == == Other websites == * dickdelicious.com Category:Musical groups established in 1992 Category:1992 establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Musical groups from Atlanta Category:Heavy metal bands Category:American rock bands
title: Dick Delicious and the Tasty Testicles
